homePageText.title: Azure SignalR Services Diagnostics
homePageText.description: Use Azure SignalR Service Diagnostics to investigate how your service is performing, diagnose issues, and discover how to improve its reliability. Select the problem category that best matches the information or tool that you're interested in:
homePageText.searchBarPlaceHolder: Search for common problems, tools and more

categories.name: Availability And Performance
categories.description: Investigate common issues impacting the health of your SignalR Service.

categories.name: Resources Usage
categories.description: Find out the resource usage on your SignalR Service.
